name: Coin Dozer - World Tour Pro
description:
Check out the free version! Try it before you buy it!

Pro Version Features:
★No advertisements
★Better performance (as a result of having no advertisements)
★Start with 100 Coins
NOTE: Prizes and Coins from Free version do not transfer to the Pro version.

Everyone knows the smash-hit game COIN DOZER with 10,000,000 downloads and counting! But a new year calls for a brand new COIN DOZER and to help bring in the Year of the Rabbit, Game Circus introduces COIN DOZER: ASIAN NEW YEAR!

★★★★★

#1 app in Japan, Hong Kong, Taiwan, U.K., Macau, Netherlands, Malaysia, and the Philippines!
#1 game in France, Belgium, Denmark, and Indonesia!
#2 game in the U.S. and many more!

★★★★★

With COIN DOZER: ASIAN NEW YEAR you'll visit the palace courtyard and drop coins into the box for New Year's goodies! Don't drop them off the side or they'll get picked up by the patygoers in the streets! Welcome the new year by collecting rabbit statues, fireworks, Japanese objects and more to earn special bonuses and even more coins! Keep an eye out for the elusive and powerful dragons! Gain levels for special effects and grab special coins to further increase your coin-nabbing power! Don't worry if your coins run out, more will be filling up your New Year's envelope very soon. Check back often in order to complete your collection!

HAPPY NEW YEAR!

Game includes:
★Rockin' new 3-D graphics!
★The best physics of any coin game out there!
★Over 35 Special Coins and Prizes to collect!
★Tons of special effects!

More updates coming soon!

Don't forget to check out the original "Coin Dozer", "Cookie Dozer", "Horse Frenzy" and "Dog Racer"!
